Title: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter
Plot: After being announced dead and taken to a morgue, Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives, escapes from the hospital, and stalks a group of friends renting a house in the countryside near Crystal Lake.
Tagline: Jason's back, and this is the one you've been screaming for.
Writers: Victor Miller, Ron Kurz, Martin Kitrosser
Stars: Erich Anderson, Judie Aronson, Peter Barton
